item.title: CVE-2021-36203|2024-09-17T02:12:16.472Z -- johnnson%20controls -- metasys%20system%20configuration%20tool%20%28sct%29
item.description: The affected product may allow an attacker to identify and forge requests to internal systems by way of a specially crafted request.
